nodes.bodyText:
It is defined, but since we only need to use this in the dependency management section once ... why bother with the complexity?
Unless of course some build wants to use -Dprint-lib.version=2.1-SNAPSHOT for testing ...

nodes.bodyText: Oracle now provides jdbc drivers on maven central, due to a change of policy.

+         <artifactId>ojdbc8</artifactId>
+         <version>19.6.0.0</version>
+       </dependency>

nodes.bodyText:
From e351a60 it looks like it was related to "All http requests now use one configurable object allowing mocking and testing objects that need to make https request.".
Exclusions were also updated in 0d462e1
Not an expert on this and no objection to make it consistent on both modules.
